assertion.value: The authors declare no competing financial interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Whole genome sequence data have been deposited at the European Genome-phenome Archive (EGA,), which is hosted by the EBI, under accession code EGAS00001000664. Genotype data for target samples is available at The database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP,), under Accession number phs000448.v1.p1.
